item.description:
We haven't had dimsum in a long time. Sorry for the short notice, but we hope you can join us for some delicious dimsum. Please RSVP, we will reserve tables as needed. After dimsum, we may walk around the Boston Garden since it will be nice and sunny.

You can get discounted parking from Shoppers Garage at 40 Beach St. (across from East Ocean Rest). Bring your parking tix with you and get it validated at China Pearl. $6 for 3 hours.
item.how_to_find_us: We will reserve tables under Lucy's name.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum - Saturday
